Q3b-third_moment_left.name: name
Q3b-third_moment_left.question: Assume a fixed location. For the left panel, which of the below statement(s) (is)are true?

options.a: The time-averaged value of η³ is zero
options.b: The time-averaged value of η³ is smaller than zero
options.c: The time-averaged value of η³ is larger than zero
options.d: As a best guess, there is a wave-averaged transport in the direction of wave propagation.
options.e: As a best guess, there is a wave-averaged transport against wave propagation.
options.f: As a best guess, there is no wave-averaged transport.

feedback.correct: Correct. Note that we have assumed here that the skewness of the orbital velocity and surface elevation are qualitatively similar and that the skewness is a good predictor for sediment transport. More on this later in this course!
